definition: to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard

sentences.english: You need be for balance and contrast, for prayer and inner peace
sentences.chinese: 你需我來趨於衡平，尋求對照，潛心祝禱，舒緩內心。

sentences.english: When worshipping in the church, she always remembers him in her prayer.
sentences.chinese: 在教堂做禮拜時，她總是在祝禱詞中爲他祈福。

sentences.english: At evenfall, I sing a poem for praying love and he kisses my lips.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚，我唱着祝禱愛情的詩篇，他於是吻我的嘴脣。

sentences.english: If you can hear my benison.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能聽見我的祝禱。

sentences.english: I sing a poem for praying love and he kisses my lips.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚，我唱着祝禱愛情的詩篇，他於是吻我的嘴脣。

definition: Feast of All Souls (fifteenth day of seventh lunar month) (Buddhism)
(Buddhism) to deliver all living creatures from suffering (idiom)
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
to pay homage at a mausoleum
millions of people all of one mind (idiom); the people united
to be reluctant to give up a post
